original: Debts and Dagger Deals
string: 债务与匕首协议

original:
[pagebreak]

Debts and Dagger Deals by Daryon Hlen, Former Clerk of the East Empire Company

[pagebreak]

old and steel often walk hand in hand, but it is debt that dictates their steps. A noble may owe a mere pittance to a moneylender, yet find himself dead in an alleyway for failing to pay. A merchant who rises too high without proper allegiance to guild or governor may find his contracts revoked - or worse, his throat slit. It is whispered that the Great Houses of Morrowind do not duel solely over honor, but over the unpaid interest on clandestine loans. The East Empire Company, often seen as a beacon of trade and law, has its own means of ensuring debts are paid. A warehouse fire here, a lost shipment there - the ledger is balanced in ways that do not always appear on parchment. One must be wary of those who collect on debts. The Thieves Guild, while known for their smuggling and black-market dealings, often acts as an enforcer for unpaid dues. A merchant who defaults on a loan may find their shop mysteriously emptied overnight, their family conveniently relocated to parts unknown. Worse still are the clandestine agreements made between nobles and assassins. The Dark Brotherhood does not merely take contracts for vengeance or personal vendettas - many a contract has been placed by a creditor seeking to make an example of a debtor. To owe is to be owned, and there are those who ensure that every debt is repaid, in coin or in blood.
string:
[pagebreak]

债务与匕首协议 作者 达里恩·赫伦，前东帝国公司职员

[pagebreak]

黄金与钢铁常携手同行，但真正支配其步伐的是债务。贵族或许只欠放贷人微不足道的数目，却可能因未能偿还而陈尸巷尾；商人若在崛起时未向行会或总督表以恰当忠诚，会发现自己的合同被撤销 —— 或更糟，喉咙被割开。 耳语相传，晨风省的大家族们决斗不仅为荣誉，更为秘密贷款的未付利息。东帝国公司常被视为贸易与法律的灯塔，却也有自己的收债手段：此处一场仓库失火，彼处一宗货物失踪 —— 账簿的平衡方式，未必都写在羊皮纸上。 需警惕那些收债者。盗贼公会虽以走私和黑市交易闻名，却常充当债务催收的执行者。拖欠贷款的商人可能发现店铺一夜之间神秘清空，家人被 “妥善” 迁往未知之地。 更甚者，是贵族与刺客间的秘密协议。黑暗兄弟会承接的契约不只为复仇或私人恩怨 —— 许多契约由债主下达，旨在以欠债者立威。 欠债即被拥有，而总有人确保每笔债务都得偿还 —— 用金币或鲜血。

original: The Economics of Empire: A Study of Coin and Conquest
string: 帝国经济学：货币与征服研究

original:
[pagebreak]

The Economics of Empire: A Study of Coin and Conquest by Jorandil, Imperial Accountant

[pagebreak]

he might of an empire is measured not only in the strength of its legions but in the wealth that fuels them. The Septim Dynasty did not endure merely through war, but through careful economic policy, trade agreements, and strategic taxation. Without gold, even the grandest empire crumbles into dust. The legions march not for glory, but for the wages that sustain them. The roads of Cyrodiil are not merely pathways, but the lifeblood of trade that feeds its people. The emperors who understood this endured; those who ignored it found their coffers empty and their thrones abandoned. Control of wealth is control of power, and those who seek dominion over Tamriel must first learn to master its economy.
string:
[pagebreak]

帝国经济学：货币与征服研究 作者： 约兰迪尔，帝国会计师

[pagebreak]

帝国的力量不仅在于军团的强盛，更在于滋养其运转的财富。塞普汀王朝的存续并非仅靠战争，更依赖缜密的经济政策、贸易协定与战略性税收。若无黄金，即便最辉煌的帝国也会化为尘埃。 军团行军不为荣耀，而为维系生计的军饷；赛瑞迪尔的道路不仅是通行路径，更是滋养子民的贸易命脉。深谙此道的皇帝得以长治久安，忽视这点的君主则会陷入国库空虚、王座易主的境地。 掌控财富即掌控权力，任何试图统治泰姆瑞尔的人，必先学会驾驭其经济。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='16'>
May Zenithar's blessings of prosperity and strength find you well.

I have heard tales of your many achievements and am humbled by the dedication and courage with which you pursue your path. Zenithar looks favorably upon those who balance courage with hard work, for in honest efforts, one finds true reward.

I write to extend a humble invitation for support. During my time in pilgrimage here at the Temple of the Divines in Solitude, I have been praying for blessings upon those who give generously and work faithfully. If you are moved to make a donation, however small, know that your gift would help us greatly in continuing to uplift those who labor with integrity.

Should you wish to meet, I am available here in Solitude, and I would be honored to offer a blessing over your holdings and lands, that they may flourish and remain protected.

May Zenithar guide your steps and reward your goodwill in all things.

With sincere gratitude,

Eldric Ironward
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='16'>

我谨以此信，诚邀你的支持。我在独孤城的众神神庙朝圣期间，一直为慷慨给予、忠实务工者祈祷赐福。若你愿意捐赠，无论多寡，请知晓你的馈赠将极大助我们继续扶持那些正直劳作的人。\r\n\r\n若你愿相见，我在独孤城此处等候。我将荣幸为你的产业与土地赐福，愿其兴旺并永得庇护。

若你愿相见，我在独孤城此处等候。我将荣幸为你的产业与土地赐福，愿其兴旺并永得庇护。

愿泽尼萨尔指引你的脚步，在万物中回报你的善意。

致以诚挚谢意，

“铁卫”埃尔德里克
</font>

original: Guild Wars: The Battle for Trade Supremacy
string: 行会战争：贸易霸权之争

original:
[pagebreak]

Guild Wars: The Battle for Trade Supremacy by Quintus Perillius

[pagebreak]

amriel's guilds are not merely collections of tradesmen - they are forces of economic and political power that rival the great noble houses. The East Empire Company did not achieve its dominance through mere enterprise, but through careful manipulation of trade laws, strategic sabotage of competitors, and, if whispers are to be believed, the quiet elimination of those who refused to yield. The Merchant's Guild of Rihad once held more sway over Hammerfell's economy than the Crowns or Forebears combined. And in Morrowind, the rivalry between House Hlaalu and the Cammona Tong was not merely one of honor or ideology, but of economic control over smuggling routes and black-market trade. The Fighters Guild and Mages Guild, while ostensibly focused on combat and magic, are not exempt from this struggle. The Fighters Guild, in many cases, acts as the enforcers of merchant contracts, ensuring that debts are collected and agreements upheld. The Mages Guild, though seemingly academic in nature, controls the trade of magical artifacts and alchemical reagents, often at the expense of independent merchants. The rise and fall of guilds is as critical to Tamriel's history as the rise and fall of empires. In the end, the strongest warriors and wisest mages may shape battles, but it is the merchants and their guilds who dictate who is funded, who is supplied, and ultimately, who prevails.
string:
[pagebreak]

行会战争：贸易霸权之争 作者： 奎因图斯·佩里利乌斯

[pagebreak]

泰姆瑞尔的行会绝非商人的简单聚合 —— 它们是足以与大贵族家族分庭抗礼的经济与政治力量。东帝国公司的统治地位并非仅靠商业成就，更源于对贸易律法的精心操控、对竞争对手的战略性破坏，且若传言属实，还包括对拒不臣服者的秘密清除。 里哈德的商人行会曾对落锤省经济的影响力，超过王冠派与先祖派的总和。而在晨风省，哈拉鲁家族与魔拉格堂的竞争不仅关乎荣誉或意识形态，更在于对走私路线与黑市贸易的经济控制权。 战士行会与法师行会虽表面专注于战斗与魔法，却也难逃这场纷争。战士行会在许多情况下充当商人合同的执行者，确保债务收回与协议履行；法师行会虽看似学术性组织，却控制着魔法遗物与炼金试剂的贸易，常以牺牲独立商人的利益为代价。 行会的兴衰与帝国的更迭一样，是泰姆瑞尔历史的核心。归根结底，最强的战士与最智慧的法师或许能左右战役，但决定谁获得资助、谁得到补给、最终谁能获胜的，却是商人们及其行会。

original: Black Horse Courier - Special Edition
string: 黑马信使 - 特别版

original: TYTHIS ANDROMO LEAVES CYRODIIL A once-familiar name in certain circles of Cyrodiil's business world is no longer among us. Tythis Andromo, a Dunmer financier and entrepreneur, has left the Imperial Province under unclear circumstances, boarding a caravan bound for an undisclosed location. Attempts to reach Andromo for comment have been met with silence, leaving only speculation in his wake. Andromo's departure follows a period of mounting tensions. While few details are known, sources suggest he was involved in business dealings that attracted unwanted scrutiny. Some claim disputes with influential figures led to his abrupt exit, while others whisper of a disagreement that made staying in Cyrodiil untenable. "He was always careful, always calculating," one former associate noted. "If he left, it wasn't on a whim." Where he intends to settle remains a mystery. Some believe he is heading to Morrowind to reconnect with his roots, while others suggest a desire for a fresh start in the northern provinces. One particularly bold rumor places him in Skyrim, though what business he might have in such a rugged land is anyone's guess. [pagebreak] For now, the departure of Tythis Andromo leaves behind more questions than answers. Whether he seeks refuge, opportunity, or something else entirely, one thing is certain-this is not the last we'll hear of him. The Black Horse Courier will remain vigilant.
string: TYTHIS ANDROMO 离开了塞洛迪尔 在赛洛迪尔商业世界的某些圈子里，一个曾经熟悉的名字已经不在我们中间了。邓默的金融家和企业家Tythis Andromo在不清楚的情况下离开了帝国省，登上了一辆前往一个秘密地点的大篷车。试图联系安德洛莫发表评论的尝试遭到了沉默，只留下了猜测。 安德洛莫的离职是在一段紧张局势加剧之后发生的。虽然细节鲜为人知，但有消息称，他参与了引起不必要审查的商业交易。一些人声称，与有影响力的人物的争执导致他突然离职，而另一些人则私下里说，他们之间的分歧使得留在赛洛迪尔站不住脚。一位前同事指出：“他总是很小心，总是精打细算。”。“如果他离开，那不是一时兴起。” 他打算在哪里定居仍然是个谜。一些人认为他将前往莫洛温与自己的根重新联系，而另一些人则表示希望在北部省份重新开始。一个特别大胆的谣言称他在天际，尽管他在如此崎岖的土地上可能有什么生意，谁也说不准。 [pagebreak] 目前，Tythis Andromo的离职留下的问题比答案还多。无论他是寻求庇护、机会还是其他完全不同的东西，有一件事是肯定的——这不是我们最后一次听到他的消息。黑马信使将保持警惕。

string: 此契据兹昭告，于第四纪元年，之日，下列产业权属正式易主： 坐落于领内、名为之产业，其所有权及相关权柄自原主处，以赛普汀之约定价款（业已全数付讫）转让予。 此宗产业交易，业经领主大人依领地律例与古俗核可。凭领主授命，本转让文书正式生效并载入领宗卷库。 新业者自此享有领地内房产主应有之权柄与殊遇，然须恪守领主法庭所颁之税赋、关税及差役。凡产业交易或法权让渡，未经领主或其敕命总管明示核准者，概属无效。

original: A Treatise on Mercantile Dominance
string: 商业统治论

original:
[pagebreak]

A Treatise on Mercantile Dominance by Ambraxo Valandor

[pagebreak]

t is not the sword that determines the fate of empires, nor the mage's incantations that truly shape the world. It is coin, weighted and counted, exchanged and hoarded, that bends the will of kings and topples dynasties. The Camoran Usurper waged war with steel, but it was the merchants of Daggerfall who determined its outcome. The Tribunal's power was divine, yet House Hlaalu dictated Morrowind's prosperity. To understand history, one must trace not the path of armies, but that of gold. Merchants have always shaped the fate of Tamriel. The rise of the Alessian Empire saw grain shipments from Cyrodiil become more valuable than its legions. The Knahaten Flu, which ravaged Black Marsh and beyond, was less a natural disaster and more an economic shift - those who controlled the supply of medicines became more powerful than kings. One must consider the role of debt as well. Empires do not merely fall to invaders, but to unpaid soldiers, to mercenaries who find their wages short. The collapse of the Second Empire was not simply a matter of the Akaviri Potentates losing control - it was also the result of financial mismanagement, of trade routes severed, of coin failing to reach the hands that needed it most. The Reman Dynasty may have fallen to the blades of the Morag Tong, but their contracts were signed with septims long before the assassins struck. Thus, it is imperative that any ruler, be they a noble or a warlord, understand the delicate balance of trade. A wise ruler does not merely hoard wealth - they invest, manipulate, and control it. A king who does not master commerce will find himself a puppet of those who do.
string:
[pagebreak]

商业霸权论 作者： 安布拉索·瓦兰多

[pagebreak]

决定帝国命运的并非刀剑，真正塑造世界的也非法师的咒语。而是那被称量、计数、交换与囤积的金币，左右着君王的意志，颠覆着王朝的根基。卡莫兰篡位者以钢铁开战，但最终决定战局的是匕首滩的商人们；审判席的权力源于神性，然而晨风省的繁荣却由赫拉鲁家族主宰。若想理解历史，需追溯的不是军队的轨迹，而是黄金的流向。 商人始终在塑造泰姆瑞尔的命运。阿莱西亚帝国崛起时，赛瑞迪尔的谷物运输比军团更具价值；肆虐黑沼泽及周边的纳哈腾 流感，与其说是天灾，不如说是一场经济变革 —— 掌控药物供应者的权势超越了君王。 债务的作用亦需考量。帝国覆灭不仅源于外敌入侵，更因士兵欠饷、雇佣兵薪资短缺。第二帝国的崩溃并非仅因阿卡维尔君主失控，亦是财政管理混乱、贸易路线断绝、金币无法抵达最需要之手的结果。雷曼王朝或许亡于魔拉格堂的刀刃，但刺客动手前，他们的契约早已用塞普汀签署。 因此，任何统治者，无论贵族或军阀，都必须理解贸易的微妙平衡。明智的统治者不只是囤积财富，更会投资、操纵并掌控它。不精通商业的国王，终将沦为精通此道者的傀儡。

To the esteemed <Alias=Player>,

News of your commercial activities has not gone unnoticed. Your stewardship of <Alias=Store> has garnered admiration, and I find myself keenly interested.

I hereby extend an offer of <Global=__Coinmaster_NobleOffer> gold in exchange for full ownership of <Alias=Store>. With the proper investment, I believe this venture could flourish even further.

Should you wish to discuss this proposal, I will be available in <Alias=NobleLoc>, within the hold of <Alias=NobleLocHold>. I hope we may come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

If I do not receive word from you within <Global=__Coinmaster_NobleOffer_DaysLeft> days, I shall assume you've declined, and the matter will be considered closed.

With respect,  

-- <Alias=Noble>

original: The Price of Power: Bribes, Bargains, and Betrayal
string: 权力的代价：贿赂、交易与背叛

original:
[pagebreak]

The Price of Power: Bribes, Bargains, and Betrayal by Anonymous Author

[pagebreak]

he signing of a decree, the naming of a successor, the betrayal of a friend - all these things have a price. Some claim rulers are guided by honor or divine right, but the wise know that the most powerful decisions in history have been made not in throne rooms, but in candlelit back rooms over heavy purses of septims. The fall of Potema the Wolf Queen was not solely a matter of war, but of alliances secured through financial means. The dissolution of the Reman Dynasty was hastened by the weight of bribes placed in the right hands. The great warlords of Elsweyr do not merely fight for control of sugarcane fields - they ensure their rivals' wealth disappears before a battle is ever fought. One must recognize that every ruler, no matter how noble in stature, has debts to pay. Whether these debts are owed to noble houses, guilds, or shadowy figures who never reveal their names, they shape policy as much as any advisor. A king who refuses to pay these unseen debts soon finds himself without allies, without armies, and ultimately, without a throne. Bribery is not a crime of desperation - it is an art. The most skilled rulers understand when to offer gold and when to demand it. A poorly placed bribe can undo years of careful diplomacy, while a well-timed pouch of septims can change the course of history. In the end, power does not belong to those who sit upon thrones. It belongs to those who control the flow of wealth, for they are the true architects of Tamriel's fate.
string:
[pagebreak]

权力的代价：贿赂、交易与背叛 作者： 匿名

[pagebreak]

一道政令的签署、一位继承者的任命、一位友人的背叛 —— 凡此种种皆有代价。有人称统治者受荣誉或神权指引，但智者皆知，历史上最具影响力的决策并非在王座厅中诞生，而是在烛光摇曳的密室里，伴随着沉甸甸的塞普汀钱袋落下。 狼女王波特玛的覆灭并非仅因战争，更在于通过金钱维系的联盟；雷曼王朝的瓦解，亦因贿赂被精准地投入关键之手而加速。艾斯维尔的大军阀们不仅为甘蔗田的控制权而战 —— 他们会在开战前确保对手的财富不翼而飞。 须知每位统治者，无论其形象何等崇高，皆有债务需偿还。无论这些债务是欠贵族家族、行会，还是从未透露姓名的神秘人物，它们与任何顾问一样，深刻塑造着政策走向。拒绝偿还这些隐形债务的国王，很快会发现自己众叛亲离、无兵可遣，最终失去王座。 贿赂并非绝望者的罪行，而是一门艺术。最娴熟的统治者深谙何时施舍黄金，何时索取回报。一笔错置的贿赂可毁多年精心经营的外交，而一袋时机恰当的塞普汀却能改变历史进程。 最终，权力不属于端坐王座者，而属于掌控财富流动的人 —— 他们才是泰姆瑞尔命运的真正缔造者。

original: Thalmor Dossier: Andromo
string: 梭莫档案：安德罗莫

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

Status: Person of Interest (Surveillance & Containment Recommended), High Priority - Emissary-Level Approval

Description: Male, Dunmer, age unknown
[pagebreak]
Background:
Tythis Andromo was once a minor financier operating under House Hlaalu contracts during the later years of the Third Era, focusing on discreet money-lending and asset recovery for high-risk ventures. Following the decline of Hlaalu influence and instability in Raven Rock, Andromo left Morrowind entirely and resurfaced in Cyrodiil, where he is believed to have operated a private brokerage specializing in debt consolidation and property repossessions.

Thalmor surveillance reports confirm that several years ago, Andromo abruptly liquidated his Cyrodiilic assets and traveled to Skyrim, where he has since established himself under the guise of a private businessman. Multiple field observations indicate that he has been quietly acquiring properties, forging lucrative business contracts, and embedding himself within Skyrim's merchant networks.

Our analysts suspect that his movements are deliberate and strategic rather than opportunistic. Though there is no confirmed evidence of direct anti-Dominion activity, his increasing financial control over key Skyrim markets may be indirectly enabling factions hostile to Thalmor interests.

Operational Notes:
While Andromo maintains a public persona as a benign investor, intercepted ledgers and courier manifests strongly imply that he is facilitating the rapid consolidation of wealth and property across Skyrim. If left unchecked, his network could destabilize regional trade balances and weaken Thalmor influence over Imperial-aligned supply chains.

There are unconfirmed reports linking Andromo's finances to several smuggling operations moving goods between Skyrim and Cyrodiil, potentially bypassing Dominion-controlled checkpoints. This requires further verification.

At present, surveillance only is recommended. Capture and interrogation protocols should remain contingent upon verified connections to anti-Dominion groups, including but not limited to Blade remnants, dissident Dunmer cells, and Stormcloak financiers.

Agents are advised to exercise extreme caution - Andromo is known to employ mercenaries and bounty hunters as personal enforcers, and several of his debt-collection operations have resulted in fatalities. He currently operates primarily out of Ivarstead, though his financial influence reaches far beyond his immediate surroundings.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

状态：相关人员（建议监视和控制），高优先级-使者级批准

描述：男，Dunmer，年龄不详
[pagebreak]
背景
Tythis Andromo曾是第三时代后期根据House Hlaalu合同经营的小金融家，专注于为高风险企业提供谨慎的贷款和资产追回。随着Hlaalu影响力的下降和Raven Rock的不稳定，Andromo完全离开了Morrowind，并在Cyrodiil重新露面，据信他在那里经营着一家专门从事债务整合和财产收回的私人经纪公司。

Thalmor监控报告证实，几年前，Andromo突然清算了他的Cyrodilic资产，并前往Skyrim，在那里他以私人商人的名义建立了自己的地位。多个实地观察表明，他一直在悄悄地收购房产，签订利润丰厚的商业合同，并将自己嵌入Skyrim的商业网络。

我们的分析人士怀疑，他的行动是蓄意和战略性的，而不是机会主义的。尽管没有确凿的证据表明存在直接的反自治领活动，但他对关键天际市场日益增强的财务控制可能间接助长了敌视塔尔莫利益的派系。

操作说明：
虽然Andromo保持着作为一名善意投资者的公众形象，但被截获的账簿和快递清单强烈暗示他正在促进Skyrim财富和财产的快速整合。如果不加以控制，他的网络可能会破坏地区贸易平衡，削弱Thalmor对帝国联盟供应链的影响力。

有未经证实的报道称，Andromo的财务状况与几次在Skyrim和Cyrodiil之间运输货物的走私活动有关，这些走私活动可能绕过自治领控制的检查站。这需要进一步核实。

目前，只建议进行监测。抓捕和审讯协议应继续取决于与反自治组织的经核实的联系，包括但不限于刀锋残余分子、持不同政见的邓默小组和斯托姆克洛克金融家。

建议特工们格外小心——众所周知，安德罗莫会雇佣雇佣雇佣兵和赏金猎人作为私人执法者，他的几次收债行动都导致了人员死亡。他目前主要在Ivarstead经营，尽管他的财务影响力远远超出了他周围的环境。

</font>

original: Apologies
string: 致歉

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
To our valued client,

After a recent review of our ledgers, we discovered a serious miscalculation within our coin-counting system. It seems your account balance had grown so vast that it exceeded the numerical capacity of our records, causing the figures to... fold in on themselves.

Please rest assured that your wealth remains secure. However, to prevent further disruptions - and to avoid the collapse of our entire bookkeeping division - we have recalibrated your account to a fixed sum of 800.000 gold. 

Consider this a protective measure, not a penalty. You may continue to deposit, withdraw, and earn interest as before, but our scribes warn that no account can safely hold much more than this limit without causing "numerical instability" (their words, not mine).

We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your continued trust in the Markarth Treasury House.

-- Alard Veylin, Markarth Treasury House
string:
致我们尊贵的客户，

在最近对我们的账簿进行审查后，我们发现我们的硬币计数系统中存在严重的计算错误。看来你的账户余额增长得太大了，超过了我们记录的数字容量，导致这些数字……自行折叠。

请放心，您的财富是安全的。然而，为了防止进一步的中断，并避免我们整个簿记部门的崩溃，我们已将您的账户重新调整为80万黄金的固定金额。 

把这看作是一种保护措施，而不是惩罚。你可以像以前一样继续存款、取款和赚取利息，但我们的文士警告说，没有一个账户可以安全地持有超过这个限额的资金，而不会造成“数字不稳定”（他们的话，不是我的）。

对于由此造成的任何混淆或不便，我们深表歉意，并感谢您对Markarth Treasury House的持续信任。

--Alard Veylin，Markarth财政部大楼

string: 很好。你已迈出建立伟业的第一步，但仍有许多事要做。

original: Properties are the backbone of any lanlord's fortune. The more you own, the more opportunities you will uncover.
string: 房产是所有领主财富的基石。你拥有的越多，发现的机遇就越多。

original: Focus on acquiring new properties and strengthening your hold.
string: 专注收购新房产，巩固势力。

original: Once your reach is wide enough, I'll show you how we can turn your success into something even more powerful...
string: 一旦你的影响力足够广，我会告诉你如何将成功转化为更强大的力量……

original: ... Something that will make even the wealthiest nobles take notice. For now, stay sharp and keep your coin flowing.
string: …… 甚至让最富有的贵族都注意到你。现在，保持敏锐，让金币源源不断。

original: I used my Influence. What's next?
string: 我动用了我的影响力。接下来呢？

original: I heard about that. And I actually have some news for you myself.
string: 我听说了，其实我自己也有消息要告诉你。

original: I acquired more properties as you suggested me.
string: 我按你的建议收购了更多房产。

original: You've come a long way. Once, you were just another traveler, looking for opportunities.
string: 你进步很大。曾几何时，你只是个寻找机遇的旅者。

original: Now, you own more properties than most Jarls, and your wealth is well secured. There's little left for me to teach you.
string: 现在，你拥有的房产比多数男爵还多，财富也已稳固。我几乎没什么可教你了。

original: But even those who have mastered wealth sometimes need a trusted voice. Should you ever require counsel, I will be here.
string: 但即使是精通财富的人，有时也需要可靠的建议。若你需要建议，我会在这里。

original: After all, even the most prosperous must stay vigilant.
string: 竟，最繁荣的人也必须保持警惕。

original: You will always be welcome here. Feel free to use my ledger and expand your influence as you see fit.
string: 这里永远欢迎你。随意使用我的账簿，按你认为合适的方式扩大影响力。

original: This might sound... strange, but I did enjoy having you around.
string: 这可能听起来…… 奇怪，但我确实喜欢你在身边。

original: For some reason, I believe you will go far. You've built much already, yet I sense your journey is far from over.
string: 不知为何，我相信你会走得很远。你已建立不少基业，但我感觉你的旅程远未结束。

original: I bid you farewell... my friend.
string: 再见了…… 我的朋友。

original: I now own a bank chest in Markarth.
string: 我现在在马卡斯城有一个银行保险箱。

original: Word has it you have been travelling with quite a lot of gold.
string: 听说你旅行时带了不少金币。

original: With my knowledge and your wealth, we could easily become rich.
string: 凭我的知识和你的财富，我们很容易变得富有。

original: Go on.
string: 继续。

original: Let me introduce myself first. I am Master Andromo.
string: 先自我介绍一下，我是安德罗莫大师。

original: I work with the most wealthy and influential people of Tamriel and I have recently opened my office here, in Skyrim.
string: 我与泰姆瑞尔最富有、最有影响力的人合作，最近在天际开了这间办公室。

original: Word is, you've amassed quite a fortune during your travels.
string: 听说你在旅途中积累了相当可观的财富。

original: What I offer is an opportunity to invest your gold and make even more.
string: 我提供的是投资金币、赚取更多财富的机会。

original: How does that sound to you? A chance to let your gold work for you, growing with every smart decision we make.
string: 听起来如何？让你的金币为你工作，每做一个明智决定，财富就会增长。

original: You can stop right now. I'm not interested.
string: 你现在可以停下了。我没兴趣。

original: I see. You know where to find me.
string: 我明白了。你知道去哪找我。

original: Interesting. What's your role in all of that?
string: 有意思。你在这一切中扮演什么角色？

original: Ah, now we're getting to it. I am the one who lays the groundwork,the one who connects opportunity to gold. Think of me as your partner.
string: 啊，现在说到点子上了。我是打基础的人，是将机遇与黄金连接的人。把我当作你的伙伴吧。

original: A guide, if you will, who ensures your investments yield returnsworth bragging about. You provide the capital; I'll provide the expertise.
string: 如果你愿意，可以把我当作向导，确保你的投资获得值得吹嘘的回报。你提供资金，我提供专业知识。

original: Most importantly, I bring expertise in paperwork - an essential skill if you wish to work with me.
string: 最重要的是，我带来了文书工作的专业知识 —— 如果你想和我合作，这是一项基本技能。

original: I'm not interested.
string: 我不感兴趣。

original: How disappointing. You know where to find me.
string: 真令人失望。你知道去哪找我。

original: I bid you farewell.
string: 我向你道别。

original: Why would I invest my gold if I already have so much of it?
string: 我已经有这么多金币了，为什么还要投资？

original: Ah, a fair question! Gold sitting idle is gold wasted. With my help, you can turn your fortune into an empire. Wealth begets wealth, my friend.
string: 啊，好问题！闲置的金币就是浪费的金币。在我帮助下，你能将财富铸成帝国。财富生财富，朋友。

original: Your gold would become a mere tool to acquire more properties, which in turn will bring you more coins... And infuence.
string: 你的金币会成为收购更多房产的工具，而房产又会带来更多金币…… 以及影响力。

original: So, what do you say?
string: 所以，你答应吗？

Stop that!

string: 抱歉，现在歇业。稍后再来。

string: 你说服我了，泰提斯。

string: 干得漂亮。

string: 我会考虑的。

original: Be quick. Opportunities do not last long.
string: 动作快点。机遇不等人。

original: Now for the next step...
string: 现在该下一步了……

original: You need to acquire a new property first. Shops, inns, you name it.
string: 你得先收购新房产。商店、客栈，随便你选。

original: If I may make a suggestion, you should head to Vilemyr Inn, here in Ivarstead.
string: 若允许建议，你该去伊瓦斯泰德的烂醉如泥旅店。

original: The owner, Wilhelm, is a proud Nord in dire need of currencies. I am sure he will agree to work for you if you bring enough to the table.
string: 店主威廉是个骄傲的诺德人，急需金币。你若出价够高，他定会同意为你效力。

original: Come back to me once your first property has been acquired.
string: 收购第一处房产后再来找我。

original: You�re thinking like a true investor now. Keep at it.
string: 你现在有真正投资者的思维了。坚持下去。

original: A fine choice. This will surely aid your endeavors.
string: 明智之选。这定会助你成功。

original: Every step forward brings greater opportunity. Well done.
string: 每前进一步，机遇就更大。做得好。

original: A wise investment. You're beginning to see the bigger picture.
string: 明智的投资。你开始着眼大局了。

original: Wealth is more than coin - it�s the power to shape the world. This is a step in that direction.
string: "财富不止是金币 —— 更是塑造世界的力量。这是迈向它的一步。

original: A small change now, a greater fortune later. That�s how influence is built.
string: 现在的小改变，会换来未来的大财富。影响力就是这样积累的。

original: Control, power, and prosperity � all within reach, if you make the right moves.
string: 掌控、权力、繁荣 —— 只要步步正确，皆可触及。

original: A clever adjustment. The right tools make all the difference.
string: 巧妙的调整。选对工具至关重要。

original: This will open doors, mark my words.
string: 记住我的话，这会为你打开大门。

original: A promising choice. But there�s always another step forward...
string: 有前途的选择。但永远有下一步……

original: You�re setting the foundation for something much greater. Keep going.
string: 在为更伟大的事业奠定基础。继续前进。

original: Fortune favors those who plan ahead. This will serve you well.
string: 机遇偏爱有备之人。这会让你受益匪浅。

original: For the last time, Nazeem, I will not work with you. Now be gone!
string: 最后一次，纳齐姆，我不会和你合作。现在滚！

original: Humpf.
string: 哼。

original: I have a few questions.
string: 我有几个问题。

original: And I might have a few answers.
string: 或许我能给你些答案。

original: I have a few questions.
string: 我有几个问题。

original: Ah, the East Empire Company - I have heard of your dealings with them. If you're concerned, don't be. I have no interest in stepping on their toes.
string: 啊，东帝国公司 —— 我听说过你和他们的交易。如果您担心，不必如此。我对插手他们的事务没兴趣。

original: And if this partnership of yours turns a profit, who am I to argue? It only proves you have an eye for opportunity.
string: 而且如果你们的合作能盈利，我又何必反对呢？这只能证明你有发现机遇的眼光。

original: How will our partnership impact my work with the East Empire Company?
string: 我们的合作会对我在东帝国公司的工作有什么影响？

original: Ah, the old debate - gold by the sword or gold by the ledger.
string: 啊，老生常谈的问题 —— 靠剑挣金币，还是靠账簿挣金币。

original: Adventuring is fast coin, but it comes with an early grave. Business, on the other hand, is slow... but the coin keeps flowing even when you sleep.
string: 冒险来钱快，但可能让你早逝。而商业呢，虽然缓慢…… 但即使你睡觉时，金币也会源源不断。

original: Smart ones do both - invest your loot, and you won't need to swing a blade forever.
string: 聪明的人两者兼顾 —— 把战利品投资出去，你就不用永远挥剑了。

original: How profitable is this compared to adventuring?
string: 这和冒险相比哪个更赚钱？

original: Have you ever made a bad investment?
string: 你有没有过失败的投资？

original: Heh. A ship. The Seastrider. Paid good gold to fund its voyage - promised a hull full of ebony on return.
string: 呵，有次投资了一艘船，“海行者号”。我花了大价钱资助它远航，对方承诺归来时会装满乌木。

original: Pirates, storms, betrayal... who knows? I learned a lesson, though. Never invest what you can't afford to lose.
string: 海盗、风暴、背叛…… 谁知道呢？但我学到了一课：永远不要投资你输不起的东西。

original: What do you think of the East Empire Company?
string: 你怎么看东帝国公司？

original: A machine of gold and politics. Efficient, powerful� but slow.
string: 那是一台由黄金和政治构成的机器。高效、强大…… 但运转缓慢。

original: They move like glaciers - unshakable, but too large to see the little opportunities we can seize.
string: 他们像冰川一样移动 —— 坚不可摧，但太过庞大，看不到我们能抓住的小机遇。

original: Work with them if you can. Just don't expect them to play fair.
string: 能和他们合作就合作，但别指望他们会公平竞争。

original: Markarth belongs to the Silver-Bloods, like it or not. Pushing against them could be dangerous.
string: 不管你承不承认，马卡斯属于银血家族。与他们对抗可能很危险。

original: But if they were to disappear one day, well - power rarely stays unclaimed for long.
string: 但如果有一天他们消失了…… 嗯，权力很少会长期空缺。

original: Patience, my friend.
string: 耐心点，朋友。

original: The people of Markarth refuse to work for me.
string: 马卡斯的人拒绝为我工作。

original: While you were busy building your new empire, I met with a representative of the Jarl of Markarth.
string: 在你忙着建立新帝国的时候，我会见了马卡斯男爵的代表。

original: After much discussion, we reached an agreement - since he works in the city's Treasury House, you are now allowed to open a bank chest.
string: 经过多次讨论，我们达成了协议 —— 由于他在城市的财政部工作，你现在可以开设银行保险箱了。

original: Why do I need to open a bank chest?
string: 为什么我需要开一个银行保险箱？

original: To ask this question is to ask why you need your gold safe, friend.
string: 朋友，问这个问题就像问为什么需要把金币存安全一样。

original: As you expand your influence, so will jealousy. Envy.
string: 随着你影响力的扩大，嫉妒和觊觎也会随之而来。

original: To have a safe place to deposit your gold is no luxury in your case. I would urge you not to wait for too long.
string: 对你来说，有个安全的地方存放金币不是奢侈。我劝你不要等太久。

original: I trust your judgement. I'll be heading to Markarth.
string: 我信任你的判断。我会去马卡斯。

original: Good decision my friend.
string: 好决定，朋友。

original: Ah yes, we have been expecting you.
string: 啊，是的，我们一直在等你。

original: Master Andromo's friends are our friends as well. You could benefit a lot from our services.
string: 安德罗莫大师的朋友也是我们的朋友。你能从我们的服务中受益匪浅。

original: We will thus allow you to open a bank chest, with the promise that your gold will be kept safe...
string: 因此，我们允许你开设银行保险箱，并承诺你的金币会得到妥善保管……

original: ... And will even grow-thanks to our generous interest rates.
string: …… 而且还会增长 —— 感谢我们慷慨的利率。

original: The initial price to open a chest is 5,000 septims, and we will begin rewarding you once your deposited gold reaches 8,000. What do you say?
string: 开设保险箱的初始费用是 5000 塞普汀，当你存入的金币达到 8000 时，我们会开始给你回报。你觉得如何？

original: I would like some informations about your banking system.
string: 我想了解一下你们的银行系统。

original: I understand, not everyone can afford those fees.
string: 我理解，不是每个人都能负担这些费用。

original: I'll think about it.

string: 好吧，我们别浪费彼此的时间了，好吗？

original: I do not have the necessary funds right now.
string: 我现在没有足够的资金。

original: Wonderful. You now have access to our services. Speak with me whenever you wish to deposit or withdraw gold.
string: 太好了。你现在可以使用我们的服务了。每当你想存取金币时，就来找我。

original: The letter comes from somebody named Tythis Andromo, who seems to have an offer for me. If I wish to hear what he has to say, I should head to his office, in Ivarstead.
string: 信件来自一个叫泰提斯・安德罗莫的人，他似乎想给我提供一个机会。如果我想听听他的提议，应该前往他在伊瓦斯泰德的办公室。

original: I agreed to work with Tythis and I successfully bought my first property: Vilemyr's Inn. Tythis asked me to take a look at the ledger in his office. It should allow me to take decisions as my influence expands.
string: 我同意与泰提斯合作，并成功买下第一处房产：烂醉如泥旅店。泰提斯让我查看他办公室的账簿，这能帮助我在影响力扩大时做出决策。

original: I took at look at Tythis' ledger. It will allow me to make decisions as my influence grows. What more can Tythis teach me?
string: 我查看了泰提斯的账簿，它能让我在影响力增长时做出决策。泰提斯还能教我什么？

original: To expand my influence, I must acquire additional properties. Once accomplished, I should return to Tythis.
string: 为了扩大影响力，我必须收购更多房产。完成后应返回泰提斯处。

original: I acquired a significant amount of properties. I should head back to Tythis, see if he has something else to teach me.
string: 我已收购大量房产，应该回到泰提斯那里，看看他是否有其他教导。

original: Tythis has managed to arrange a private bank chest for me after considerable effort. With his connections, he's secured a safe spot for my gold and valuables.With my wealth safe, I will be able to focus on expanding without fear of loss. I should head to Markarth Treasury House and see that everything is done.
string: 泰提斯经过不懈努力，为我安排了一个私人银行保险箱。凭借他的人脉，他为我的金币和贵重物品确保了安全存放处。财富得以保障，我能专注扩张而无需担心损失。我应该前往马卡斯财政部，确认一切就绪。

original: My empire is flourishing, and I now possess a bank chest where I can deposit as much gold as I please. With this security, I can focus on my business, collect my fair share, and extend my influence across all of Skyrim. It is time for me to go back to Tythis.
string: 我的商业帝国蓬勃发展，现在拥有了可随意存入金币的银行保险箱。有了这层保障，我能专注经营、收取应得份额，并将影响力扩展至整个天际。是时候回到泰提斯身边了。

original: My empire is flourishing, and I now possess a bank chest where I can deposit as much gold as I please. With this security, I can focus on my business, collect my fair share, and extend my influence across all of Skyrim.Through careful investments and strategic decisions, I have secured properties, forged lucrative partnerships, and learned to wield my wealth as a tool of power. The ledger is no longer just ink on parchment - it is the foundation of my growing dominion.Tythis has little left to teach me, yet his counsel remains invaluable. The paths before me are mine to choose, and with my wealth secured, nothing is beyond my reach. My empire is no longer a dream; it is a reality, and it is only the beginning.
string: 我的商业帝国蓬勃发展，现在拥有了可随意存入金币的银行保险箱。有了这层保障，我能专注经营、收取应得份额，并将影响力扩展至整个天际。通过谨慎投资和战略决策，我已 securing 房产、建立利润丰厚的合作关系，并学会将财富作为权力工具来运用。账簿不再只是羊皮纸上的墨迹 —— 它是我日益壮大的统治根基。泰提斯已无太多可教，但他的建议仍具无价之宝。前方的道路由我选择，财富既已保障，便无不可触及之物。我的帝国不再是梦想，而是现实，且这仅仅是开始。
